Package model

Class User

java.lang.Object
model.User
public class User extends Object
Represents a user in the application. A user has a nickname, tracks the number of games played, games won, games lost, and their level.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    User(String nickname)
    Constructs a new User with default attributes.
    User(String nickname, Integer gamesPlayed, Integer gamesWon, Integer gamesLost, Integer level)
    Constructs a new User with specified attributes.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addGameLost()
    Increments the games played and games lost, updating user statistics.

    addGameWon()
    Adds a won game, increments games played and games won, updates the level, and updates user statistics.

      public User(String nickname, Integer gamesPlayed, Integer gamesWon, Integer gamesLost, Integer level)
      Constructs a new User with specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The username of the user.
      gamesPlayed - The number of games played by the user.
      gamesWon - The number of games won by the user.
      gamesLost - The number of games lost by the user.
      level - The level of the user.

      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • login

      public static User login(String nickname)
      Logs in a user with the given username fetching his data from a json file.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The username of the user.
      Returns:
      The logged-in User.
      Throws:
      IncorrectUserNameException - If the username is not valid.
      UnexistingUserException - If the user does not exist.

    • register

      public static User register(String nickname)
      Registers a new user with the given username, saving data in a json file.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The username of the user.
      Returns:
      The registered User.
      Throws:
      IncorrectUserNameException - If the username is not valid.
      UserAlreadyExistsException - If the user already exists.

    • updateUserStats

      public void updateUserStats()
      Updates user statistics in the json file.

      Creates a User object from a JSON representation.
      Parameters:
      jsonObject - The JSON object representing the user.
      Returns:
      The User object created from the JSON.

      public org.json.simple.JSONObject toJSON()
      Converts the User object to a JSON representation.
      Returns:
      The JSON object representing the user.
